00017 
00018         FTS3_PARAM_GRIDFTP = "gridftp";
00019         FTS3_PARAM_MYPROXY = "myproxy";
00020         FTS3_PARAM_DELEGATIONID = "delegationid";
00021         FTS3_PARAM_SPACETOKEN = "spacetoken";
00022         FTS3_PARAM_SPACETOKEN_SOURCE = "source_spacetoken";

00048 CliManager* CliManager::manager = 0;
00049 
00050 CliManager* CliManager::getInstance() {
00051 
00052         if (!manager) {
00053                 manager = new CliManager();
00054         }
00055         return CliManager::manager;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void CliManager::setInterface(string interface) {
00059 
00060         if (interface.empty()) return;
00061 
00062 
00063         char_separator<char> sep(".");
00064         tokenizer< char_separator<char> > tokens(interface, sep);
00065         tokenizer< char_separator<char> >::iterator it = tokens.begin();
00066 
00067         if (it == tokens.end()) return;
00068 
00069         string s = *it++;
00070         major = lexical_cast<long>(s);
00071 
00072         if (it == tokens.end()) return;
00073 
00074         s = *it++;
00075         minor = lexical_cast<long>(s);
00076 
00077         if (it == tokens.end()) return;
00078 
00079         s = *it;
00080         patch = lexical_cast<long>(s);
00081 }
00082 
00083 string CliManager::getPassword() {
00084 
00085     termios stdt;
00086     // get standard cmd settings
00087     tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, &stdt);
00088     termios newt = stdt;
00089     // turn off echo while typing
00090     newt.c_lflag &= ~ECHO;
00091     if (tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newt)) {
00092         cout << "submit: could not set terminal attributes" << endl;
00093         tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &stdt);
00094         return "";
00095     }
00096 
00097     string pass1, pass2;
00098 
00099     cout << "Enter MyProxy password: ";
00100     cin >> pass1;
00101     cout << endl << "Enter MyProxy password again: ";
00102     cin >> pass2;
00103     cout << endl;
00104 
00105     tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &stdt);
00106 
00107     if (pass1.compare(pass2)) {
00108         cout << "Entered MyProxy passwords do not match." << endl;
00109         return "";
00110     }
00111 
00112     return pass1;
00113 }

00115 int CliManager::isChecksumSupported() {
00116     return isItVersion370();
00117 }
00118

00149 int CliManager::isItVersion330() {
00150     return major >= 3 && minor >= 3 && patch >= 0;
00151 }
00152 
00153 int CliManager::isItVersion340() {
00154     return major >= 3 && minor >= 4 && patch >= 0;
00155 }
00156 
00157 int CliManager::isItVersion350() {
00158     return major >= 3 && minor >= 5 && patch >= 0;
00159 }
00160 
00161 int CliManager::isItVersion370() {
00162         return major >= 3 && minor >= 7 && patch >= 0;
00163 }
